message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand your position, but the product is worth considerably more than your offer. I'm willing to come down slightly to $13,000. This is my final offer.

Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I've considered it carefully, but I still believe the product should be priced closer to my initial assessment. I would like to counter with an offer of $12,500 for the product.
